ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( $Permission.Allow_MQL_Conversion, Domain_Match_on_Lead__c = 0, ISPICKVAL(Status, "Converted"), OR( ISPICKVAL(MQL_Type_Lead__c, "Type 1"), ISPICKVAL(MQL_Type_Lead__c, "Type 2"), AND( ISPICKVAL(MQL_Type_Lead__c, "Type 3"), Engagement_Score__c >= 100 ) ), OR( ISBLANK(FirstName), ISBLANK(LastName), ISBLANK(Email), ISBLANK(Company), ISBLANK(NumberOfEmployees), ISNULL(FirstName), ISNULL(LastName), ISNULL(Email), ISNULL(Company), ISNULL(NumberOfEmployees) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill the mandatory fields (First Name, Last Name, Email, NumberOfEmployees, Company) for MQL conversion
